title: Wanted teen arrested
content:
SYLVESTER, GA (WALB) - The Sylvester Police Department says they have arrested Equavious Breshon Osby.
Osby was wanted on eight counts of Aggravated Assault for the shooting that occurred early Saturday morning on Royal Street in Sylvester.
SPD Investigation Division Commander Lt. Ronnie Graddy says that Osby has an address in Ty Ty, Georgia in Tift County, and frequents Tifton often. Osby was considered armed and dangerous.
Graddy says this investigation is still on going and other charges and offenders are expected.
